content: How can I use C# code to compare the population density of two countries, taking into account a new constraint on the ratio of urban to rural population? I have data on the population and area of Australia and China, and I need to create a table to compare their population and area. Additionally, I need to determine which country has a higher population density, given that Country A has a ratio of 1:2 urban to rural population and Country B has a ratio of 2:3 urban to rural population. Can you provide me with a sample code that can help me achieve this task? Your assistance in this matter would be greatly appreciated.
